name: Super T-34: A Tank In Space
name_original: Super T-34: A Tank In Space
description:
Super T-34 is an exciting Run'n'Gun platformer, that will Challenge you with it's momentum based physics and tight ammunition management. Defeat the Earth Relocation Extremists and save all of humanity!

If you dig the soundtrack, you can find it for free at https://spacebasssupernatural.bandcamp.com/album/super-t-34-ost
